What is the weirdest thing you‚Äôve ever autographed on? A sanitary napkin! - @awryaditi #LateNightBeerSessions
Q: what do you do when people take offense? A: you take the support of the crowd! - @sapanv #LateNightBeerSessions
@nevillesays ‚Äòit‚Äôs also about staying true your character. If I try and do intelligent stuff
column4: it won‚Äôt work.‚Äô #LateNightBeerSessions

text: Q: how did you know this was your style? - it takes a long time to find that just like any art form - @sapanv #LateNightBeerSessions
My relatives still don‚Äôt know what I do. My dad says to them ‚Äòhe does what Raju Srivastava does in English!‚Äô - @sapanv
I used to put up funny things on Twitter and facebook so my friends said why don‚Äôt you share your loneliness on stage ? - @sapanv
I did an open mic night and then won it - because my friends cheered for me! - @nevillesays #LateNightBeerSessions
Women did notice me so I started playing the guitar. Then I did stand up comedy and they still didn‚Äôt notice me! - @nevillesays
The thing with stand up is that you‚Äôre constantly putting yourself out there and it‚Äôs terrifying! - @awryaditi #LateNightBeerSessions
I hate performing for rich people.. Just because they‚Äôll never laugh! - @awryaditi #LateNightBeerSessions
Comedy in India is in that space where it‚Äôs still very niche but I‚Äôm doing a show in Lucknow and Dehradun.. So it‚Äôs happening! - @awryaditi
I once flew to Delhi to do a show and my payment was water and garlic bread ! - @awryaditi
My professional story is that I‚Äôve never really worked - @awryaditi
